name(The Checkpoint!)
snap(0,0,0)
sky(255,255,255)
ground(100,100,100)
polys(100,100,100)
clouds(166,166,166,5,-593)
texture(0,0,0,50)
fadefrom(0)
mountains(1899)
nlaps(127)

set(77,0,0,-2000000000,0)

set(47,0,0,250,0)

chk(40,0,10000,-180,0)
set(10,0,10000,250,0)
set(23,0,12500,250,180)
set(23,0,7500,250,0)
set(28,0,10000,250,0)
set(28,0,10000,250,90)
set(10,0,10000,250,90)
set(23,2500,10000,250,90)
set(23,-2500,10000,250,-90)
set(54,1000,9000,250,45)
set(54,1000,11000,250,-45)
set(54,-1000,11000,250,45)
set(54,-1000,9000,250,-45)

maxb(0,-19200,-28800)
maxt(0,19200,-28800)
maxr(0,19200,-28800)
maxl(0,-19200,-28800)
